amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Science Foundation by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds authorized in section 3 by 1 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 301 (Roll no. 290).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Campbell (CA).
